feedback module¶

feedback.format_feedback(bool_list)¶

When given a bool list with a length of at least 16, format_feedback() will check for any entries set to true and compile a comment of all of the format errors.

Parameters

bool_list (list of bool) – Must be a bool list of at least 16 length.

Returns

A pre-made comment regarding the exact kind of format errors were found.

Return type

str

feedback.grammar_feedback(score)¶

When given an integer input between 0 and 3 (inclusive), grammar_feedback() will return a pre-made comment where 0 is the best comment and 3 is the worst.

Parameters

score (int) – Must be between 0 and 3, any other integer will cause the best comment to be used by default.

Returns

A pre-made comment regarding the quality of the essays grammar and spelling.

Return type

str

feedback.idea_feedback(score)¶

When given an integer input between 0 and 2 (inclusive), idea_feedback() will return a pre-made comment where 0 is the best comment and 2 is the worst.

Parameters

score (int) – Must be between 0 and 2, any other integer will cause the best comment to be used by default.

Returns

A pre-made comment regarding the quality of the ideas presented in the essay.

Return type

str

feedback.keyword_feedback(score)¶

When given an integer input between 0 and 3 (inclusive), keyword_feedback() will return a pre-made comment where 0 is the best comment and 3 is the worst.

Parameters

score (int) – Must be between 0 and 3, any other integer will cause the best comment to be used by default.

Returns

A pre-made comment regarding the number of keywords used in the essay.

Return type

str

feedback.length_feedback(score)¶

When given an integer input between 0 and 2 (inclusive), length_feedback() will return a pre-made comment where 0 is meeting the length requirement, 1 is going over the maximum length, and 2 is going under the minimum length.

Parameters

score (int) – Must be between 0 and 2, any other integer will cause the best comment to be used by default.

Returns

A pre-made comment regarding overall length of the essay.

Return type

str

feedback.organization_feedback(score)¶

When given an integer input between 0 and 2 (inclusive), organization_feedback() will return a pre-made comment where 0 is the best comment and 2 is the worst.

Parameters

score (int) – Must be between 0 and 2, any other integer will cause the best comment to be used by default.

Returns

A pre-made comment regarding the quality of the overall organization in the essay.

Return type

str

feedback.reference_feedback(score)¶

When given an integer input between 0 and 2 (inclusive), reference_feedback() will return a pre-made comment where 0 is the best comment and 2 is the worst.

Parameters

score (int) – Must be between 0 and 2, any other integer will cause the best comment to be used by default.

Returns

A pre-made comment regarding how many references were found or missing.

Return type

str

feedback.style_feedback(score)¶

When given an integer input between 0 and 2 (inclusive), style_feedback() will return a pre-made comment where 0 is the best comment and 2 is the worst.

Parameters

score (int) – Must be between 0 and 2, any other integer will cause the best comment to be used by default.

Returns

A pre-made comment regarding the overall style of the essay.

Return type

str
